original_text: And you shall do to Ai and its king as you did to Jericho and its king. Only its spoil and its livestock you shall take as plunder for yourselves. Lay an ambush against the city, behind it.”
korean_text: 너는 여리고와 그 왕에게 행한 것 같이 아이와 그 왕에게 행하되 오직 거기서 탈취할 물건과 가축은 스스로 가지라 너는 아이 성 뒤에 복병을 둘지니라 하시니

sentences.original_text: And you shall do to Ai and its king
as you did to Jericho and its king.
sentences.korean_translation: 네가 여리고와 그 왕에게 행했던 것과 같이

sentences.original_text: Only its spoil and its livestock
you shall take as plunder for yourselves.
Lay an ambush against the city
